front.title: JWTClaimConstraints profile of ACME Authority Token

abstract.t: This document defines an authority token profile for the validation of JWTClaimConstraints and EnhancedJWTClaimConstraints certificate extensions within the Automated Certificate Management Environment (ACME) protocol. This profile is based on the Authority Token framework and establishes the specific ACME identifier type, challenge mechanism, and token format necessary to authorize a client to request a certificate containing these constraints.
